title: Can Skjelmose Beat Back the Bigs at Liège-Bastogne-Liège? ‘I See Myself on the Podium with Pogačar, Van der Poel’
content:
Skjelmose recovered and raring to race after being carried hypothermic from the bike at Flèche: 'I couldn't control myself.'

Read the full article at Can Skjelmose Beat Back the Bigs at Liège-Bastogne-Liège? ‘I See Myself on the Podium with Pogačar, Van der Poel’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
